Subtype.Name: FA Ledger Entry FA Posting Type

Arguments.Value: Feature will be enabled by default
Feature will be enabled by default
Feature will be enabled by default
Feature will be enabled by default.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the values you missed you specify.

Properties.Name: InstructionalText
Properties.Value: The following fields are not set up correctly for SAF-T. Do you want to fill them in now?

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the SAF-T source code description.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies if G/L entries with no source codes must be exported with this SAF-T source code.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the VAT specification of the involved customer or vendor to link transactions made for this record with the appropriate general ledger account according to the VAT posting setup.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the VAT product posting group. Links business transactions made for the item, resource, or G/L account with the general ledger, to account for VAT amounts resulting from trade with that record.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies how VAT will be calculated for purchases or sales of items with this particular combination of VAT business posting group and VAT product posting group.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the relevant VAT rate for the particular combination of VAT business posting group and VAT product posting group. Do not enter the percent sign, only the number. For example, if the VAT rate is 25 %, enter 25 in this field.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies a description of the VAT posting setup

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the starting date of the VAT posting setup entry. It will be used for the EffectiveDate XML node in the SAF-T file.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the code of the VAT posting setup that will be used for the StandardTaxCode XML node in the SAF-T file for the sales VAT entries.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the code of the VAT posting setup that will be used for the StandardTaxCode XML node in the SAF-T file for the purchase VAT entries.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the code of the VAT posting setup that will be used for the TaxCode XML node in the SAF-T file for the sales VAT entries.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the code of the VAT posting setup that will be used for the TaxCode XML node in the SAF-T file for the purchase VAT entries.

Arguments.Value: Feature will be enabled by default.

Properties.Name: InstructionalText
Properties.Value: The SAF-T (Standard Audit File - Tax) is a standard file format for exporting various types of accounting transactional data using the XML format. This guide helps you set up SAF-T for Dynamics 365 Business Central. If you do not have a chart of accounts, this guide helps you to create it based on SAF-T standard chart of accounts. If you do not want to set this up right now, close this page.

Properties.Name: Caption
Properties.Value: Welcome to the setup of SAF-T

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the description of what is going to happen during the data update task.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies whether the user does understand the update procedure and agree to proceed.

Properties.Name: InstructionalText
Properties.Value: When sending your SAF-T file to the tax authorities, each G/L account must be mapped to either a financial standard account or the income statement for the type of business.

Properties.Name: InstructionalText
Properties.Value: Specify the preferred standard account type and then choose the Import the source files for mapping button. Import the mapping codes for standard tax and according to the mapping type specified in the field. Then choose Next.

Properties.Name: InstructionalText
Properties.Value: Specify the preferred standard account type and choose Next.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the type of the standard general ledger accounts.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the type of the accounting period.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the starting date of the accounting period.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the starting date of the period in which the mapping is valid.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the ending date of the period in which the mapping is valid.

Properties.Name: Caption
Properties.Value: Specify the period of the first SAF-T file

Properties.Name: InstructionalText
Properties.Value: Specify the period of the first SAF-T file. Choose Next to map your chart of accounts to the values that SAF-T requires.

Properties.Name: Caption
Properties.Value: Map SAF-T accounts to your chart of accounts

Properties.Name: InstructionalText
Properties.Value: For each general ledger account, select the SAF-T account or grouping code depending on the mapping type selected in the previous step.

Properties.Name: Caption
Properties.Value: Map VAT posting setup to VAT reporting codes

Properties.Name: InstructionalText
Properties.Value: Specify a value in the Sales VAT Reporting Code field and/or the Purchase VAT Reporting Code field depending on type of operations you perform with the certain combination.

Properties.Name: Caption
Properties.Value: Set starting date for the VAT posting setup entries

Properties.Name: InstructionalText
Properties.Value: Specify a value in the Starting Date field for each VAT posting setup entry.

Properties.Name: InstructionalText
Properties.Value: Change the value of SAF-T Export on Dimensions page if a certain dimension must be skipped from export to the SAF-T File.

Properties.Name: InstructionalText
Properties.Value: Specify the employee responsible for the content of the SAF-T File. The information about the contact will be exported to the SAF-T file.

Properties.Name: InstructionalText
Properties.Value: You're ready to use the SAF-T functionality. Do an additional mapping on the G/L Account Mapping page if needed. Open the Audit File Export Document page to export the data in the SAF-T format.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Automatically match existing G/L accounts with SAF-T standard accounts codes, with either two or four digits depending on the mapping type selected in the previous step.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Create a chart of accounts in Business Central from SAF-T standard accounts codes, with either two or four digits depending on mapping type selected in the previous step.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies that currency information must be included in the export to the audit file.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the payment method to use when no value is specified for a payment or a refund.

Properties.Name: Tooltip
Properties.Value: Specifies the employee of the company whose information will be exported as the contact for the SAF-T file.

Properties.Name: DataItemLink
Properties.Value: "Cust. Ledger Entry No." = CustLedgerEntry."Entry No.", "Posting Date" = CustLedgerEntry."Posting Date"

Properties.Name: DataItemLink
Properties.Value: "Vendor Ledger Entry No." = VendorLedgerEntry."Entry No.", "Posting Date" = VendorLedgerEntry."Posting Date"

Properties.Name: Tooltip
Properties.Value: Specifies the SAF-T code that will be exported to AnalysisType XML node of the SAF-T file.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies if information about this dimension will be exported to the SAF-T file.

Properties.Name: Tooltip
Properties.Value: Specifies the code that will be exported to the JournalID XML node in the SAF-T file.
